title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Macy’s stock rallies after same-store sales see first growth since 2022
items.description: Sales rise at the 125 stores in Macy’s “Reimagine” network, as well as Bluemercury and Bloomingdale’s locations.

items.title: I’m 70 and have $2.6 million for retirement. Is 80% in equities too risky?
items.description: “We have been living primarily off my pensions, but plan on big family trips soon.”

items.title: ‘Her kids will have no inheritance’: Will my friend lose her house to Medicaid if she goes into a nursing home?
items.description: “She would like to leave her kids something after she dies.”

items.title: Campbell’s is catering to health-conscious consumers who are cooking more at home
items.description: Campbell’s stock rallies as the continued consumer trend of cooking from home helped fuel a profit beat.

items.title: Job openings fall again and hiring has stalled. More evidence of weakening U.S. labor market.
items.description: The number of job openings in the U.S. fell in July to the second lowest level since the pandemic and hiring patterns signal labor market is even weak...

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
